column2: "Nyankopɔn
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na atow hɛn akyen koraa yi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na w’ebufuw rehyew w’edzidzibea do nguan yi?"

column2: "Kaa wo dɔm a etɔɔ hɔn tsetseetse no a Apon hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ w’egyapadze ebusuakuw no; Na bepɔw Zion a ɔwo etsena do no."
"Ma w’anan do bra daa amamfo no ho
column3: Ɔtamfo no abɔ mbusu nyinara wɔ krɔnkrɔnbea no mu."

column2: "W’atamfo atseatsea mu wɔ w’ehyiadzifo mu; Woesisi hɔn mfrankaa ayɛ asɛnkyerɛdze."
"Wɔyɛɛ dɛ nyimpa a wɔama mbɔndua do sor Robɔtow ndupɔn petsepetse."
"Na afei no ho edwindze nyinara Wɔdze ekuma na nhamɛr ebubu egu."
"Wɔato wo krɔnkrɔnbea mu gya; Woegu wo dzin ne tsenabea ho fi akɛka famu mpo."
"Wɔka no wɔ hɔn akoma mu dɛ
column3: Wɔmma yɛnyɛ hɔn buruburoo prɛko: Wɔahyehyew Nyankopɔn ne nhyiamudan a ɔwɔ asaase no do nyinara."

column2: "Yennhu hɛn nsɛnkyerɛdze: Nkɔnhyɛnyi bi nnyi hɔ bio; Nkyii so obi nnyi hɛn mu a onyim mbrɛ ɔbɛkyɛr ekesi."
"Ao
column4: ɔtamfo no nhyɛ amen araa nkesi dabɛn? Aso ɔtamfo nkasa wo dzin ho bɔn daa?"

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na etwe wo nsa kɔ ekyir
column3: mekyerɛ wo nsa enyimfa no a? Yi fi w’akoko mu na sa hɔn."

column2: "Naaso Nyankopɔn yɛ Hen fi tsetseetse
column3: Ɔyɛ nkwagye ho edwuma wɔ asaase do."

column2: "Ɔwo na edze w’ahoɔdzen paa po mu: Ɔwo na ibubu esu mu mbowapɔn etsir."
"Ɔwo na ibubu dɛnkyɛmnyin tsir posoposo
column3: Ɔwo na edze no yɛɛ edziban maa sar do atsefo."

column2: "Ɔwo na epaa nsunyiwa na nsuyirii mu: Ɔwo na eweew esutsen a ɔpem daa no."
"Adzekyee yɛ wodze
column3: adzesaa so wodze a; Ɔwo na esiesie kan na ewia."

column2: "Ɔwo na etwitwa asaase ahe nyinara: Ɔwo na ayɛ hyewber na awɔwber."
"Kaa iyi dɛ
column4: Na dɛ ɔman nkwasea aka wo dzin ho nsɛmbɔn."

column2: "Ao
column3: mma nnyi w’atamram no nkwa nnhyɛ abowa bɔyafo no nsa: Mma wo werɛ mmfir w’ehiafo nkwa da."

column2: "Ma w’enyi mbra ahyɛmu no do: Na akatabansɛm tsenabea ayeyɛ asaase nkukua mu ma."
"Ao
column3: mma mma nyia wɔhyɛ no do no mmfa enyito nnsan mmba: Ma ɔbɔbɔnyi na ohianyi nkamfo wo dzin."

column2: "Nyankopɔn
column4: bedzi wankasa w’asɛm: Kaa mbrɛ ɔkwasea no esi rehyɛ wo ahorba adzekyee nyinara."

column2: "Mma wo werɛ mmfir w’atamfo ndze: Hɔn a wɔsoɛr tsia wo no hɔn weɔɔ weɔɔ a ɔfow sor daa no."
